TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ECDiffieHellmanCng extends System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman
Public NotInheritable Class ECDiffieHellmanCng Inherits ECDiffieHellman

summary.span: 提供椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的下一代加密技术 (CNG) 实现。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm.

summary.span: 此类用于执行加密操作。

span.span: This class is used to perform cryptographic operations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类可实现双方交换私钥材料，即使正通过公共通道进行通信。The class enables two parties to exchange private key material even if they are communicating through a public channel. 双方可以计算相同的密钥值，该值被称为*机密协议*托管 Diffie-hellman 类中。Both parties can calculate the same secret value, which is referred to as the *secret agreement* in the managed Diffie-Hellman classes. 机密协议然后可以用于多种用途，包括用作对称密钥。The secret agreement can then be used for a variety of purposes, including as a symmetric key. 但是，而不是公开机密协议直接，类会后的处理一致时，才提供值。However, instead of exposing the secret agreement directly, the class does some post-processing on the agreement before providing the value. 此 post 处理称为*密钥派生函数 (KDF)*; 你可以选择你想要使用的 Diffie-hellman 对象的实例上设置的一组属性通过其参数的 KDF。This post processing is referred to as the *key derivation function (KDF)*; you can select which KDF you want to use and set its parameters through a set of properties on the instance of the Diffie-Hellman object. |密钥派生函数Key derivation function|属性Properties| |-----------------------------|----------------| || 的用于处理机密协议哈希算法。 - The hash algorithm that is used to process the secret agreement.

的要添加到之前进行哈希处理机密协议可选的字节数组。 - An optional byte array to prepend to the secret agreement before hashing it.

的要追加到之前进行哈希处理机密协议可选的字节数组。 - An optional byte array to append to the secret agreement before hashing it.| || 的用于处理机密协议哈希算法。 - The hash algorithm that is used to process the secret agreement.

的要添加到之前进行哈希处理机密协议可选的字节数组。- An optional byte array to prepend to the secret agreement before hashing it.

的要追加到之前进行哈希处理机密协议可选的字节数组。 - An optional byte array to append to the secret agreement before hashing it.| || -用于密钥派生标签。 - The label for key derivation.

的密钥派生种子。 - The seed for key derivation.| 传递的机密协议通过密钥派生函数的结果是可用作你的应用程序的密钥材料的字节数组。The result of passing the secret agreement through the key derivation function is a byte array that may be used as key material for your application. 生成的密钥材料的字节数是依赖于密钥派生函数中;例如，SHA 256 将生成 256 位的密钥材料，而 sha-512 将生成 512 位的密钥材料。ECDH 密钥交换的基本流程如下所示：The number of bytes of key material generated is dependent on the key derivation function; for example, SHA-256 will generate 256 bits of key material, whereas SHA-512 will generate 512 bits of key material.The basic flow of an ECDH key exchange is as follows: 1. Alice 和 Bob 创建密钥对用于 Diffie-hellman 密钥交换操作Alice and Bob create a key pair to use for the Diffie-Hellman key exchange operation 2. Alice 和 Bob 配置 KDF 上同意使用参数。Alice and Bob configure the KDF using parameters the agree on. 3. Alice 向 Bob 发送她的公钥。Alice sends Bob her public key. 4. Bob 将 Alice 发送了他的公钥。Bob sends Alice his public key. 5. Alice 和 Bob 使用对方的公钥来生成机密协议，并对生成的密钥材料机密协议应用 KDF。Alice and Bob use each other's public keys to generate the secret agreement, and apply the KDF to the secret agreement to generate key material. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类来建立的密钥交换和如何使用该密钥来加密一条消息，可以通过公共通道发送和接收方解密。The following example shows how to use the class to establish a key exchange and how to use that key to encrypt a message that can be sent over a public channel and decrypted by the receiver. [!code-csharp[ECDiffieHellmanCng#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdiffiehellmancng/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ECDiffieHellmanCng#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ecdiffiehellmancng/vb/program.vb#1)]

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class whose public/private key pair is generated over the specified curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `curve` 必须验证 (即，它必须返回`true`) 时传递给方法，并且必须已命名或显式质数。`curve` must validate (that is, it must return `true`) when passed to the method and must be either a named or explicit prime.

span.span: does not validate.

summary.span: 派生从双方之间的机密协议生成的密钥材料。

span.span: Derives the key material that is generated from the secret agreement between two parties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 椭圆曲线 Diffie-hellman (ECDH) 算法可接受的私钥和另一方的公钥作为输入，并生成作为输出机密协议。The Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm accepts the private key and the other party’s public key as input, and produces the secret agreement as output. 然后，密钥派生函数 (KDF) 采用机密协议，并且生成密钥材料作为输出。The key derivation function (KDF) then takes the secret agreement and produces the key material as output.

summary.span: 获取双方之间生成的机密协议的一个句柄。

span.span: Gets a handle to the secret agreement generated between two parties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重载是针对高级用户需要原始的机密协议而不是密钥材料的句柄。The method overloads are for advanced users who need a handle to the raw secret agreement instead of the key material. 机密协议句柄可在平台调用调用来执行未包装的任何工作类。The secret agreement handle can be used in platform invoke calls to perform any work that is not wrapped by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `curve` 必须验证 (即，它必须返回 true 时传递给方法)，而且不能隐式。`curve` must validate (that is, it must return true when passed to the method) and must not be implicit. 在 Windows 上不支持特性 2 曲线。Characteristic-2 curves are not supported on Windows.

span.span: does not validate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ImportParameters(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters parameters) cil managed

span.span: The curve's parameters to import.

summary.span: 将 对象的指定参数作为密钥导入当前实例。

span.span: Imports the specified parameters for an object as a key into the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法替换该对象正在使用通过创建新的现有密钥对象。The method replaces the existing key that this object is working with by creating a new object. 如果`parameters`只包含字段，然后再导入只是公钥。If `parameters` contains only the field, then only a public key is imported. 如果`parameters`还包含，然后导入完整密钥对。If `parameters` also contains , then a full key pair is be imported. `parameter` 值指定的曲线以导入的类型。The `parameter` value specifies the type of the curve to import.

span.span: does not validate.

exception.span: 引用无法导入的一条曲线。

span.span: references a curve that cannot be imported..

exception.span: 引用此平台不支持的一条曲线。

span.span: references a curve that is not supported by this platform.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ SecretAppend { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置生成密钥材料时将追加到机密协议的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that will be appended to the secret agreement when generating key material.
The value that is appended to the secret agreement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于密钥派生如果或使用密钥派生函数 (KDF)。This value is used for key derivation if the or key derivation function (KDF) is used. 值附加到机密协议，并合并的值传递给 KDF 以生成密钥材料。The value is appended to the secret agreement, and the combined value is passed to the KDF to generate the key material. 默认情况下，该值为 `null`。By default, the value is `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ SecretPrepend { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

value.span: 密钥派生期间追加到机密协议开头的值。

span.span: The value that is appended to the beginning of the secret agreement during key derivation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值用于密钥派生如果属性设置为下列值之一：This value is used for key derivation if the property is set to one of the following values: - - 值前面机密协议，并且组合的值将传递到密钥派生函数 (KDF)，以生成密钥材料。The value is prepended to the secret agreement, and the combined value is passed to the key derivation function (KDF) to generate the key material. 默认情况下，该值为 `null`。By default, the value is `null`.
